namuth api me dennage sambande gana siyaluma dewal kiwwa.

ohun dedena wisin laba di athi aakruthi patha්raye nawathumipola, stikaraya liyapadinchi ankaya, ayithikaruge nama, lipinaya, hadunumipath ankaya, durakathana ankaya, ga්ramasewa wasama, jayarupa ankaya athulu thawath karunu gananawakin samanwithaya mema stikarayata pahalin parissamin gihin enna yanuwenda sadahan kara atha.
hungak welawata kama mese sarasenne pan, bath, dhanya warga, kesel gedi saha gas labu walin.
mema p rathimurthiya itha wishalaya; mehi p ramanaya ema kalaye owunta wada dhanawath anug rahakayinge niyamayanta samanaya.

mema margaye boho sthanawala tharathattu sampurnayenma galawi galmathuwi athi athara wishala walawal hari thibe.me nisa gamanagamana katayuthuwaladi badha athiwa thibena athara papadi ha yathurupadikaruwan wati thuwala labu awasthada atha.chayarupaya - nagoda wishesha.

mewani siduwim hethuwen daruwan muhuna dena gataluda wisandimata haki wana paridi swadhina suparikshana mandalayak pathkarana bawa ki amathyawaraya diwayine siyalu rajaye paudgalika ha jathyanthara pasal ema swadhina suparikshana mandalaya thulin niyamanayata lak kirimata katayuthu karana bawada kiya sitiyeya.
ee pilibandawa paryeshana kala mahacharya judika kordigliya shri saluwe eya satahanwa athi aakaraya mana baluwe ya.
eeth ee bawak kathawe penna na.
mirijjawila karmantha wyapruthiyata, maththala guwanthotupolata, hamnthota warayata ee widihata janathawage idam balahathkarayen pawara gaththa.
eheth eya sidu kale na.
hoda wade ookata..
api aluth aanduka්rama wyawasthawak abiyasa nam inne pa්radhana paksha ee sambandhawa katha karala ekangathawak athi karagatha yuthuyi neda?
eyata kaha, malu thambu wathura, lunu dama uthurawaganna.
wadidura parikshana jaala polisiya sidukarayi.
ehenam api balamuko naw gana katha karanna kalin nawaka pradhana danagathayuthu kotas monawada kiyala.

wasara 2000di sanath jayasuriya yatathe pakisthanayedi 2-1 lesa test tharagawaliyak jaya ganimen pasuwa wides thanathille pakisthanayata erehiwa wasara 17kata pasu tharagawaliyak jaya ganimada wisheshathwayaki.

api nam dawasama patta fan ekak gaththa me skayip wairas eken !!

gewalwala balliyo pataw gahuwama horenma pansalata gihin danawa,unahapuluwath uge patawnta aadarelune, ammagen pataw wen karanawa, ewath sasare duk wipaka pinisama pawathinawa, ethakota gabsa karagena kalala winasa kirima~ loke kanthawo boho denek duken innawa kusedima daruwan nethi wenawa kiyala, samaharu kusa hodata meruwata passeth nathi wenawa, mawage jiwathath anathurata path wenawa,pahu giya dawasaka apita dana ganna labuna eka hora madhyasthanayaka kunu kudayaka edina pamanak kala gabsawan 15 pamanatibuna kiyala,minisath bawak laba ganima mona tharam amaru karanayakda?pera thaman karapu ewani karmayaka wipaka hatiyata kusata ena daruwan nathi wi yanawa, bimbisara rajathumage puthatath daruwo na~ bodiraja kumaraya kiyanne bimbisara rajathumage putha, me puthata hithuna me mulu mahath dambaadiwama katawath nathi widihe raja maligawak hadanna, kumaraya pera kuti gewal hadala dun pina mathu wimen ithamath daksha wadu basunnahe kenek hoya gaththa , wishala watupakuth gewala diwya wimanayak wage maligayak nirmanaya kala, me maligaye nama {kokanada} ,me maligaya athata penenne kurullek piyambaanna innawa wageyi, budu radun maligayata wadama karayi~ bodiraja kumarayata mona sampaththi thibunath daru sampththi na ,thama piyathuma wana bimbisara rajathuma budurajanan wahanse ge hodama shrawakayek nisa piyathumageth maga penwimen aluth maligayata gewadime mangalya budun pramukha maha sangha rathnaya wadamawa danayak pirinamimata thiranaya una, maha peraharak sudanam karawala usas lesa uthsawaya sudanam kala,maligayata piwisena doratuwe idan dana shalawa wana thek alankara pawadayak ela , bodiraja kumaraya prarthanayak kala `mahata dawa bisawun kusin daruwaku labe nam buduradun mema pawadaya mathin wadama karana sekwa` parachiththa wijanana nyanayen yuktha budu samidane pawada ahakata kara wadama kala, danayen anathuruwa buduradun gen me gana wimasimak kala,kumaraya oba kala prarthanaya itu nowena nisayi ma pawadaya ahakata kale, obathuman pera aathma bhawayaka sidu kala maha akusala karmayaka palayak lesa me bhawayedi daruwana nolabana bawa pera athma bhawaye sidu kala karmaya sihipath kala, kurulu biththara kadala kala~ mema kumaru pera aathmayaka welendek , dawasak piriwara sahithawa naw nagi weladamata pitath una, athara magadi wishala kunatuwakata hasu wela nawa kadi muhudu bath una, kumaru lali kallaka aadharayen dina kihipayak pina awith godabimakata paminiya, bada ginannata kanna yamaka hewwa, kisima deyak hoya ganna nohaki una, ohu dakka kurulu kuduwak thiyenawa, gahata nagala kurulu kuduwe thibuna biththara aran kadala kawa, kurulu biththara kadala ka pawin daru pala nolabi yanabawa desana kala budurajanan wahanse , thaman thamanwa arakasa kara gannata uwamana nam, dukak pidawak nathiwa inna oona nam , kuda kalaye ho, tharuna kalaye ho , mahalu kalaye ho thamange jiwithaya kusal dahamin purawa gatha yuthuyi,athithaya gana duk we wi kangatu wanawata wada me mohothe patan thamange aarakshawa salasa gatha yuthuyi, e sadaha obata me mohothe patan kusal karannata sith pahala wewa.
kattiya wibhaga pidanaya atha arinna hondama chans eka.
